tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:40:08|40:9]].
This was an offering grain or flour. People offered "food offerings" to show that they were thankful to God.
The word "he" refers to the man who looked like bronze. (See: [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:40:03|40:3]])

tn.ref: its wall with it all around had a length
tn.text: This can be translated as a new sentence, "The house had a wall all around it that had a length."
